hanzi-su-wiki:
東

Значения

Восток

Мнемоника


В густых лесах на востоке Китая солнце 日 появляется через силуэты деревьев 木.

Варианты

东
purpleculture_pinyin:
dōng
east; host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest); landlord
Восток; хозяин (т.е. сидящий с восточной стороны от гостя); домовладелец

  • sun 日 rising behind the trees 木, starting its course to the west; con.: sunrise, straight line from east to west

东东		east, eastern, eastward

heisig_chinese_memo: Traditionally seen as a pictograph of the sun rising behind a tree in the east.
heisig_story: As a "Western" language, English identifies the east with the rising sun. In more fanciful terms, we see the sun piercing through a tree as it rises in the east.
koohiiStory1: Traditionally seen as a pictograph of the sun rising behind a tree.
koohiiStory2: The sun pierces through the trees as it rises in the east…　　　　　　RTK2:　トウ　東北　とうほく (the northeast)　東京　とうきょう(Tokyo)… MIXED GROUP　凍506　(ﾁﾝ):陳1301　(ﾚﾝ): 練1343　錬2030.
jp_example_words:
東(あずま): east, Eastern Japan
関東(かんとう): Kantou (eastern half of Japan, including Tokyo)
東西(とうざい): East and West, Orient and Occident, whole country, Your attention, please!
東洋(とうよう): Orient
東(ひがし): east
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Behind that tree the sun is rising in the east. The sun always rises in the east, so if you head that way, past the tree, you'll be going east too.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the sun behind the tree, don't picture the sun alone, you'll burn your eyes. It's slowing coming up behind it. Now think: where does the sun rise? In the east!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You walk east for a few hours until you finally come to a city. It's とうきょう. Oh! とうきょう is in the east. I get it now!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: When you think about East Japan think about とうきょう. And if you're bad at geography, just look at a map for a while. Or, stand outside in the morning, watch the sun rise behind the trees, and point that way. That's east, it's where とうきょう is!
Ru_Notes: Стороны света: 北 [きた] север, 南 [みなみ] юг, 西 [にし] запад, 東 [ひがし] восток.
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 日 (день), 木 (дерево), 田 (рисовое поле)
Ru_trainchinese:
dōng: (сущ) восток
dōng: (сущ) хозяин, владелец
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Pictograph of a rickshaw which are the  traditional little cars found in the east.
humanum_full_description_en:
A gold inscription is a shape that is like a pouch and tied at both ends of the bag. The original meaning is a bag. Borrowed as the " East " of the East . "poetry. Zhao Nan. "Little Star": "Bah Bi Little Star, three to five in the east."

The sacs of a golden inscription are filled with things, and the two ends are bottomless and tied with ropes. " East ", " sack ", "㯱", " beam " shape is similar, " East ", " beam " is the word of differentiation, see " bundle ." " East " Jiajin inscriptions are all borrowed as locative words, indicating the east. Such as "Dongtu Shounian" ("Collection" 9735). Chen Qing Ding: "The government has violated the province and the east, only then (in) Xinyi." Yin Gui: "Dongkai (he) Wuyi".

"East" is the place where the sun rises and has profound cultural significance. In ancient times, when saluting, the subject is in the east and the guest is in the west. Therefore, the host’s family is called the "host" or "host", and the "landlord" refers to the person who rents out the house; the "store owner" refers to the shop owner. As the Cantonese saying goes: "The boss doesn't hit the west." "The boss" refers to the employer and the boss. The whole sentence means that if you don't work for this employer, you will work for another employer.

Since the sun rises from the east, the east symbolizes " yang " and the west symbolizes " yin ." Han Zhao Ye "Wu Yue Chun Qiu. "Gou Jian Conspiracy Biography": "Li Dongjiao is named as Donghuang Gong for offering sacrifice to the sun, and Xijiao is named as Xiwangmu for offering sacrifice to Yin."

The "East Lord" is the ruler of the heavens, leading the male gods, and the same name as the "West Queen" who rules the female gods. Today, Wudi Mountain, Zhifang Town, Jiaxiang County, Jining City, Shandong Province, was the cemetery of the Wu family in the late Eastern Han Dynasty. On the top of the east gable of the front stone chamber of Wu's Temple (Wurong Temple), there are portraits of the Eastern Prince, and the top of the west gable is carved with the portrait of the Western Queen. The painting of the Middle Eastern prince wearing a mountain-shaped crown, with wings on both shoulders, sitting on the couch. On each side of the couch there is a feathered person (who has wings) to serve. There is a curly tail feather man and a flying dragon.

Ancient books record that the "Eastern Prince" lived in the stone room, which was similar to the Wu Clan Temple, but the specific appearance was different. "Sutra of Gods. "Eastern Wilderness Classic": "There is a big stone chamber in the Eastern Wilderness, where the king of the east lived. It is one foot long, with white hair, human-shaped bird face and tiger tail, carrying a black bear, looking around."

"Shuowen": "East, moving. Congmu. Guan Pu said: "From the sun in the wood." All the subordinates of the east are from the east." "Shuowen" analyzes the word " East " as from the sun in the wood. , Inaccurate.
humanum_short_description_en: A golden inscription bag. Borrowed as the " East " of the East .
humanum_full_description:
甲金文象囊袋中載物而綁束兩端之形，本義是袋子。借為東方之「東」。《詩．召南．小星》：「嘒彼小星，三五在東。」

　　甲金文象囊袋中裝滿東西，兩端無底而以繩束綁之形。「東」、「橐」、「㯱」、「束」字形相近，「東」、「束」是一字之分化，參見「束」。「東」甲金文皆借為方位詞，表示東方。如「東土受年」(《合集》9735)。臣卿鼎：「公違省自東，才（在）新邑。」殷簋：「東啚（鄙）五邑」。

　　「東方」是日出之處，具有深厚的文化意義。古時行禮，主位在東，客位在西。所以主人家叫「東主」、「東道主」，又如「房東」指出租房屋的人；「店東」指店主。粵語俗語云：「東家唔打打西家」，「東家」指僱主、上司，全句意謂不給這個僱主打工，便給另一個僱主打工。

　　由於太陽從東方昇起，東方象徵「陽」，西方象徵「陰」。漢趙曄《吳越春秋．勾踐陰謀外傳》：「立東郊以祭陽，名曰東皇公；立西郊以祭陰，名曰西王母。」

　　「東王公」是天界的統領，領導男性神仙，與統領女性神仙的「西王母」齊名。今山東省濟寧市嘉祥縣紙坊鎮武翟山，是東漢晚期武氏家族墓地。武氏祠前石室（武榮祠）東面山牆的山尖部位刻有東王公畫像，西面山牆的山尖部位則刻有西王母畫像。畫中東王公頭戴山形冠冕，兩肩皆有羽翼，端坐在榻上。榻的兩旁各有一羽人（有翅膀的人）侍奉。榻下有一個卷尾羽人和一條飛龍。

　　古書記載「東王公」住在石室，與武氏祠相合，不過具體面貌有別。《神異經．東荒經》：「東荒山中有大石室，東王公居焉。長一丈，頭髮皓白，人形鳥面而虎尾，載一黑熊，左右顧望。」

　　《說文》：「東，動也。从木。官溥說：『从日在木中。』凡東之屬皆从東。」《說文》分析「東」字為從日在木中，不確。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文象袋子。借為東方之「東」。

①方向，太陽出升的一邊，與“西”相對：東方。東經(本初子午線以東的經度或經線)。東山再起(喻失勢之後，重新恢復地位)。付諸東流。
②主人(古代主位在東，賓位在西)：房東。股東。東道主(泛指請客的主人，亦稱“東道”、“作東”)。
③姓氏。

東字的基本解释

東
dōng
见“东”。

東字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dōng］
［《廣韻》德紅切，平東，端。］
“东1”的繁体字。
(1)方位词。日出的方向。与“西”相对。
(2)向东；东去。
(3)指使向东；使往东。
(4)特指东西向。与南北向相对。
(5)东家，主人。
(6)指请客宴会的东道主。
(7)指春天。参见“東作”。
(8)指厕所。
(9)象声词。
(10)姓。舜友有东不訾。见《汉书·古今人表》。

東字的康熙字典解释
東字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
東字的起名意思

暂无。

east
Basic explanation of words
east
dōng
See "East".
east
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dōng］
["Guangyun" German red cut, Pingdong, Duan. ]
Traditional characters for "东1".
(1) Locality words. The direction of the sunrise. Contrast with "West".
(2) Go east; go east.
(3) Instruct east; make east.
(4) Specifically refers to the east-west direction. Opposite to north-south.
(5) The owner, the master.
(6) Refers to the host of the banquet.
(7) Refers to spring. See "East Works".
(8) Refers to the toilet.

dōng
вм. 东

東

Значения

Восток

Мнемоника


В густых лесах на востоке Китая солнце 日 появляется через силуэты деревьев 木.

Варианты

东

Radicals: 木, 日  (tree, sun)
Meaning Mnemonic
Behind that tree the sun is rising in the east. The sun always rises in the east, so if you head that way, past the tree, you'll be going east too.
Picture the sun behind the tree, don't picture the sun alone, you'll burn your eyes. It's slowing coming up behind it. Now think: where does the sun rise? In the east!
Reading Mnemonic
You walk east for a few hours until you finally come to a city. It's とうきょう. Oh! とうきょう is in the east. I get it now!
When you think about East Japan think about とうきょう. And if you're bad at geography, just look at a map for a while. Or, stand outside in the morning, watch the sun rise behind the trees, and point that way. That's east, it's where とうきょう is!
